messages.subject: Re:2227 - Political grandstanding
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/10/02 10:18 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Ned responds: Exactly which topics are you referring to? And please give a definition of
messages.messageBody:
on 8/10/02 10:18 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Message: 10
> Date: Sat, 10 Aug 2002 16:18:56 EDT
> From: Dnowens@...
> Subject: A Plea

> Dear Ned Vare:
> This list is not the place to bring these topics up. Please Honor That. You
> said you would. The majority requests that you would, the list moderator and
> the list owner have gently requested that you would. Although some have said
> "Don't speak for me... I like Ned's posts..." This does not negate that this
> list is still not the place for political grandstanding. There are other
> lists more suited for this kind of debate. Please.
> ~Nancy

Ned responds:
Exactly which topics are you referring to?
And please give a definition of political grandstanding and an example from
my posts. I'm not arguing, I just want to know what you mean and how I've
offended you.

Then, please make me two lists of topics -- one that you think are
appropriate, and the other for the inappropriate topics. Thanks again.

Ned Vare
